AUTHOR: irdumb
INSTALL_MSG:
You've let the a​lots loose! You must have a bunch of people calling for them huh?
Don't worry, there's one line of defense left. Yell `[p]alot` at the top of your lungs! That'll keep them at bay :thumbsup:
NAME: A​lot
SHORT: Invites all a​lots to your servers.
DESCRIPTION:
Invites all a​lots to your servers.
Also silently mentions them whenever someone says their name so that they pop into chat to see why people keep calling them.
